tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE lighting_control_schedule (
    id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    room_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    light_intensity INT,
    time_start TIME NOT NULL,
    time_end TIME NOT NULL,
    days_of_week VARCHAR(20)[]
)

CREATE TABLE schedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    light_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE schedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    repeat_days VARCHAR(50),
    CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE preferences (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    light_id INT NOT NULL,
    brightness INT NOT NULL,
    color_temperature INT NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_light_id FOREIGN KEY (light_id) REFERENCES lights(light_id)
);

CREATE TABLE schedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lighting_control_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    control_id INT,
    intensity_preference INT,
    status_preference TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_id INT,
    event_name TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    status TEXT
);
